'''Farewell of Snezhnaya''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 2.2]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2021-10-13 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2021-11-02 17:59:59

===Summary===
* During the event, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Childe" [[Tartaglia]] ({{Hydro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During the event, the 4-star characters "Eclipsing Star" [[Ningguang]] ({{Geo}}), "Frozen Ardor" [[Chongyun]] ({{Cryo}}), and "Wise Innocence" [[Yanfei]] ({{Pyro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish [[Wanderlust Invocation]].
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
